tasks.description: Compare Grok and Copilot branches for feature gaps and document differences.
Implement prompt history and context management for smarter automation.
Allow users to select files for review via multi-select, pattern, or manual entry.
Support multiple LLM endpoints and allow user selection.
Add support for loops, branching, and conditionals in automation scripts.
Improve settings UI with validation, tooltips, and better defaults.
Allow user customization of prompt templates.
Implement a dry run mode for automation jobs.
Provide feedback on LLM token usage and cost if available.
Add or improve test coverage for core features.
